rows: $\begin{aligned} & f_{1}(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right) \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{2}\right)(1+g(x)) \\ & f_{2}(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right) \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{2}\right)(1+g(x)) \\ & f_{3}(x)=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right)(1+g(x)) g(x)=\sum_{i=3}^{n}\left(x_{i}-x_{1}\right)^{2} \end{aligned}$

$\begin{aligned} & f_{1}(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right) \cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{2}\right)(1+g(x)) \\ & f_{2}(x)=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right) \sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{2}\right)(1+g(x)) \\ & f_{3}(x)=\sin \left(\frac{\pi}{2} x_{1}\right)(1+g(x)) g(x)=\sum_{i=3}^{n}\left(x_{i}-x_{1}\right)^{2} \end{aligned}$
